scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n FE,BE -c auto "pnpm -C frontend dev" "pnpm -C backend start:dev"
scripts.build: pnpm -C frontend build && pnpm -C backend build
scripts.lint: pnpm -C frontend lint && pnpm -C backend lint
scripts.typecheck: pnpm -C frontend typecheck && pnpm -C backend typecheck
scripts.format: pnpm -C frontend format && pnpm -C backend format
scripts.check: pnpm run lint && pnpm run build
